<<<<<<< HEAD
The kernell of Christianity containing a short yet full summe of our communion with Christ. / By Mr Francis Peck Mr of Arts, minister of the word and pastor at Hartford. Imprimatur Iohn Downame. Peck, Francis, d. 1651.
[2], 11+ p.
Printed by G.M. for Iohn Bellamy at the signe of the three Golden-Lyons near the Royall-Exchange, London : 1644.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 7th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
